'''Henrik Stefan JÃ¤rrel''' (born November 9, 1948, in [[Stockholm]]) is a former [[Members of the Riksdag, 2002â2006|member]] of the [[Parliament of Sweden|Riksdag]] (as a [[Moderate Party|Moderate]]), a [[Sweden|Swedish]] [[TV personality]] and media consultant. He is the son of the actors [[Ingrid Backlin]] and [[Stig JÃ¤rrel]].
JÃ¤rrel has been a member of the Riksdag 1991â1994, and then again 1995â2006, as a [[politician]] of the Moderate Party.<ref>[http://riksdagen.se/webbnav/index.aspx?nid=1111&iid=0857394544302 Parliament of Sweden: Henrik S JÃ¤rrel]</ref> He is as of June 2006 in the committee of the Constitution. JÃ¤rrel is a devout supporter of the Swedish [[monarchy]] and founded a [[Monarchism|royalist]] network in the Riksdag.
